name: SmartCast TV Firmware Update
summary: A UTV file is a firmware update file used by a Vizio SmartCast TV. It contains data the TV uses to update to the latest version of the SmartCast TV software. You can use a UTV file to manually update a TV's firmware without connecting to the Internet.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Place on a USB flash drive and install on your Vizio SmartCast TV
